```{r}
library(data.table)

# plotting
library(ggplot2)
```

read data and explore

```{r}
# read data
data <- fread("data_sim/results/data_item_variance_1_150.csv")
```

```{r}
# exploratory plot
ggplot(data) +
  geom_path(
    aes(gen, item_variance,
      colour = sim_type,
      group = interaction(replicate, sim_type)
    )
  ) +
  facet_grid(~regrowth) +
  coord_cartesian(
    xlim = c(0, 50)
  )
```
